resources:
Import Nokia Backup Supported backup file types and platforms:

 Nokia Series40 DP 2.0 (*.NBF)
 Nokia Asha 305, 306, 308, 309, 310, 311

 Nokia Asha Software Platform 1.* (*.MBK)
 Nokia Asha 500, 501, 502, 503

 Nokia X 1.* (*.VMSG, *.VCF)
 Nokia X, X+, XL

 Settings About About Import Nokia Backups
Copyright (C) 2014 Attila Csipa

 Imports backup files (text messages and contacts) from Nokia devices, powered by Series40 (Nokia Asha, Full Touch) the Nokia X Software Platform).

 Currently, there is no way of importing Windows Phone backups, hence Nokia Lumia devices are not supported.

 Feedback, comments: nokiabackup@csipa.net

 The project page is at github

 ImportNokiaBackup is licensed under the GNU GPL license v2.0

 The fine print:
 Nokia is a registered trademark of Nokia Corporation. The product names mentioned in the application are either trademarks or registered trademarks of Microsoft Corporation or Nokia Corporation, or their respective affiliates. The author of this application is not affiliated with Nokia Corporation or Microsoft Corporation

Under no circumstances will personal data contained in the backups be collected or relayed to third parties. The project might collect statistical, anonymized data (like number of messages or contacts, their lengths etc) and standard usage and crash analytics services to improve user experience. --> FileChooserActivity Empty Directory Storage was removed or unmounted.
